content.prompt:
The writer is considering deleting sentence 5 (reproduced below).

The pyramids were considered a wonder of the world by ancient writers.

Should the writer keep or delete this sentence?

choices.label: Keep it, because it adds a colorful detail that helps capture the audience’s interest in the topic of the passage.
Keep it, because it enhances the passage’s thesis statement by explaining why the audience should care about the building methods used by ancient Egyptians.
Delete it, because it fails to include the specific citations from ancient writers that would be necessary to prove its claim.
Delete it, because it blurs the focus of the introductory paragraph by shifting attention away from the methods used to construct the pyramids.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Write introductions and conclusions appropriate to the purpose and context of the rhetorical situation.
